name: Thorn

biography.description: Thorn uses Razorbloom Shells that stick to surfaces and detonate when detecting nearby opponents, propelling sharp blades in all directions and delivering lethal damage.

gameplayTips: Place Razorbloom Shells in strategic locations to deny entry to important areas.
Use the shells as traps near doorways and windows that attackers commonly use.
Combine with barbed wire to slow enemies, making it harder for them to escape the Razorbloom's detonation.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the effectiveness of your traps.
